# FLL Mission Path Planner

A web-based application for planning robot paths for FIRST LEGO League Challenge missions.

[Live Demo](https://yourusername.github.io/mission-path-planner/)

## Quick Start

1. Open `index.html` in a web browser
2. Configure your robot dimensions
3. Add movement blocks to create your path
4. Watch the path visualize in real-time
5. Export/print your plan

For detailed instructions, see [README.md](README.md)
